keyAPIs: openGraph, twitter, appLinks, appleWebApp, itunes properties
constraints: metadata must be exported from layout.tsx or page.tsx
generateMetadata is async and receives params/searchParams
headers() and cookies() are read-only in Server Components
Child page metadata merges with parent layout metadata
Replace next/head with metadata exports in App Router
Manifest file should be app/manifest.ts or app/manifest.json
Icons referenced in manifest must exist in public folder

keyAPIs: Select.Content with position prop (item-aligned or popper)
constraints: Use CSS variables like --radix-select-trigger-width for sizing
Select.Value should not be styled for correct positioning
Use Select.ItemIndicator to show selected state

keyAPIs: Responsive utility variants: sm:, md:, lg:, xl:, 2xl:
Default breakpoints: sm (640px), md (768px), lg (1024px), xl (1280px), 2xl (1536px)
Mobile-first approach: utilities apply at min-width
constraints: Apply md: prefix for tablet/desktop (768px and above)
Responsive variants only affect the specific utility they prefix
rem-based utilities scale with root font-size
px-based values (like SVG viewBox) are not affected by font-size changes
